sense.def:
The rate at which something happens
je hitrost ali pogostost dogajanja.

seg.quote: ...the rapid rate of change which the industrial world is facing.
The divorce rate is fantastically high.

sense.def:
The rate of taxation or interest
je višina davkov ali obresti, izražena v odstotkih.

seg.quote: This money is taxed at the rate of 59%.

sense.def:
Rates
je bil v Veliki Britaniji do leta 1990 krajevni davek, ki so ga plačevali lastniki stavb ali tisti, ki so oddajali neopremljene stavbe.

Izraz
rate
uporabimo, ko želimo izraziti osebno mnenje o kom ali čem. Na primer,
to rate someone as brilliant
pomeni, da je po našem mnenju tisti človek genialen.

seg.quote: She was a self-taught geologist, rated as one of the best.
On a scale of one to ten, it probably rated about number seven.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da se bo nekaj zgodilo
at this rate
, hočemo povedati, da se bo zgodilo, če se bo zdajšnje stanje nadaljevalo.

seg.quote: At this rate we'll be millionaires by Christmas!

sense.def:
Z izrazom
at any rate
nakažemo, da je pomembno tisto, kar bomo v nadaljevanju rekli, in ne tisto, kar smo že rekli.

cit.quote: kakorkoli že, naj bo tako ali drugače

seg.quote: I don't think there's been an edition since 1977; at any rate that's the one I'll be referring to.
